articles.title: Microsoft says its "trying to reinforce" Xbox Game Pass price increases "by adding more value" - GamesIndustry.biz

articles.title: It looks like Windows 11 is about to get a new dedicated OneDrive app — here's your first look - Windows Central
articles.description: OneDrive is getting its own dedicated app experience on Windows 11, complete with new Copilot features, a gallery view, and modern interface.

articles.title: New Borderlands 4 Update Buffs Vault Hunters - GameSpot
articles.description: The looter-shooter's latest patch adjusts the Vault Hunters' various skills to make them stronger.

articles.title: Inside the Vault – Burning Springs Public Test Server Release Notes - Bethesda.net
articles.description: Burning Springs introduces the largest map expansion to Fallout 76 yet and it’s available for you to play on our Public Test Server right now!
